page.title: 14Cramlington:Entertainment
page.content: Cramlington has no cinemas,theatres or concert halls. The main entertainment for adults seems to be in the many {pubs}and{social clubs}in the town, which are all very popular. Many of these run{discos}for the younger adults in the town,but there is very little for the younger teenagers. There are a lot of{clubs}and{societies in the town, and many people find their entertainment through their {hobbies}or{sports.}Youth organisations like{Scouts}and{Guides}are popular, and so are the many school centred {youth clubs.}The Concordia{sports {centre}gives entertainment to many local people. There are several video hire shops in the town and many people hire{video}films to entertain themselves at home. An attraction in the summer months is the annual town {carnival.
